title: NEW PLAYSTATION PODCAST: PS I Love You XOXO
description:
Subscribe! https://www.youtube.com/user/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

This is the podcast love letter to all things PlayStation that Greg Miller and Colin Moriarty were born to do.

PS I Love You XOXO, every Tuesday 9AM PT.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/user/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Audio: https://soundcloud.com/psiloveyouxoxo
(and all Podcast providers)

Follow us on Twitter!
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation

Music by Rakohus!: http://www.youtube.com/user/rakohus

transcript_chunks.text: Hey, you remember the PlayStation podcast we used to do? Yeah, you want to do a new one? Yeah, all right. CL
